query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS patient_outcomes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  provider_id INT,
  assessment_id INT,
  protocol_id INT,
  baseline_date DATE NOT NULL,
  followup_date DATE NOT NULL,
  outcome_period_days INT,
  baseline_symptom_score INT,
  followup_symptom_score INT,
  symptom_improvement_percentage DECIMAL(5,2),
  symptom_improvement_category ENUM('significant_improvement', 'moderate_improvement', 'mild_improvement', 'no_change', 'worsening'),
  symptom_changes JSON,
  baseline_labs JSON,
  followup_labs JSON,
  lab_improvements JSON,
  baseline_qol_score INT,
  followup_qol_score INT,
  qol_improvement DECIMAL(5,2),
  protocol_adherence_percentage INT,
  missed_followups INT DEFAULT 0,
  treatment_goals JSON,
  goals_achieved JSON,
  goal_achievement_percentage DECIMAL(5,2),
  patient_satisfaction_score INT,
  would_recommend BOOLEAN,
  patient_feedback TEXT,
  provider_notes TEXT,
  outcome_success BOOLEAN,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (protocol_id) REFERENCES treatment_protocols(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX idx_user_outcomes (user_id, followup_date DESC)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bdzn41uM6mMWcv.97707ddd6929 --database 3gcYftfyZmb2335Uoynmho --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS patient_outcomes (

  symptom_changes JSON,

  followup_labs JSON,
  lab_improvements JSON,
  baseline_qol_score INT,

  qol_improvement DECIMAL(5,2),
  protocol_adherence_percentage INT,
  missed_followups INT DEFAULT 0,
  treatment_goals JSON,
  goals_achieved JSON,
  goal_achievement_percentage DECIMAL(5,2),
  patient_satisfaction_score INT,
  would_recommend BOOLEAN,
  patient_feedback TEXT,
  provider_notes TEXT,
  outcome_success BOOLEAN,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (protocol_id) REFERENCES treatment_protocols(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX idx_user_outcomes (user_id, followup_date DESC)
)
